scripts.upgrade:docker:test-support: ./tools/install-wp-tests.sh wp_test root root mysql nightly true
scripts.update-version: yarn update-version:header && yarn update-version:constant && yarn update-version:readme
scripts.prebuild: composer install --no-dev && yarn install && yarn run clean
scripts.build: yarn build:php && yarn build:css && yarn build:js && yarn build:lang && yarn build:docs && yarn build:media
scripts.build:php: cpx "*.php" dist && cpx "php/**" dist/php && yarn build:php-templates && yarn build:php-vendor
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:checkout && yarn deploy:copy && yarn deploy:update
scripts.deploy:update: yarn deploy:update:add && yarn deploy:update:rm && yarn deploy:update:commit && yarn deploy:update:tag
scripts.deploy:update:add: svn stat deploy | grep '^?' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r svn add
scripts.deploy:update:rm: svn stat deploy | grep '^!' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -r svn rm
scripts.deploy:update:commit: svn commit deploy -m "deploy from build of $npm_package_version" --no-auth-cache --username "$SVN_USERNAME" --password "$SVN_PASSWORD"
